    • Method Detail

      • deleteFile

        public static void deleteFile(File file,
              int delay,
              int retryInterval,
              TimeUnit unit)
        Delete a file after it is no longer being accessed (this is determined by caller). The file will be deleted if the VM is shutdown.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to delete.
        delay - the initial delay before the first attempt at deletion is made.
        retryInterval - the interval in which to retry if the file could not be deleted.
        unit - the unit of time for both the delay and retry interval.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object obj)
        Overrides:
